name: Arkeus
description:
Arkeus, a little text adventure game that has more adventuring than storytelling.

You can also find it at my github pages site.

It started off as a remake of some other text games I had made, but turned into a big whole project. 

This is still in the early stages of development -- it has the core functions, but it only has a couple playable areas. Updates may be infrequent, but the world will expand.
